description: {"blocks":[{"key":"baqmp","text":"This procedure provides instructions on how to prepare DNA libraries for whole genome sequencing on an Illumina MiSeq or NextSeq using Illumina’s DNA Prep Library Preparation Kit scaled to half reaction volumes with modifications to the post-PCR procedures; tagmentation stop buffer and associated washes are removed and libraries are pooled post PCR then a single size selection is performed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcnri","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j6es","text":"This protocol is used to sequence SARS-CoV-2 using the cDNA/PCR protocol: https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b3viqn4e","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":49}],"data":{}},{"key":"b2040","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"54483F61755D11EC814C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b3viqn4e"}}}}
keywords: SARS-CoV2, nCOV, COVID, COVID-19, whole genome sequencing, Illumina

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6m06q","text":"Add   of DNA to each well of 96 well PCR plate.  If the DNA volume is less than 15 µl, add nuclease-free water to the DNA samples to bring the total volume to 15 µl. Using a multichannel pipette, puncture the foil seal of the adapter plate and add  of pre-pared i7 and i5 index adapters to each sample. Pipette 10 times to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":123,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1et6l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"CFE5B080B1AC11EBA345ED34A5FDB2F9","id":"88018","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dsidc","text":"Place on the thermal cycler and run the BLT PCR program as follows: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9m41v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dv08c","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8vc3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3olb3","text":"*Depending on the total DNA input at the beginning of the experiment, the number of PCR cycles must be altered accordingly. {"blocks":[{"key":"2tqs","text":"Warm the Sample Purification Beads (SPB) to room temperature before use. Thaw the Resuspension Buffer (RSB) to room temperature before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5enu0","text":"Make   of 70-80% ethanol for washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"32ksj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"DF70BC80B1B011EBA345ED34A5FDB2F9","id":"88019","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6n6k2","text":"After the BLT PCR program has completed, remove the plate from the thermal cycler and quickly spin down to collect the contents to the bottom of the well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hmm9","text":"Put the plate on the magnetic stand until the liquid is clear (~ )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6p1kp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"E39B0540B1B011EBA345ED34A5FDB2F9","id":"79334","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2di7","text":"Multi-channel 2 µl from each column of the BLT PCR plate into an 8-tube strip avoiding bead carry over, then combine all 8 of the tubes into a 1.5mL Lo-bind Eppendorf tube labelled with the run name followed by “BLT Pool” for long term storage. The BLT PCR plate can be discarded.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ldns","text":"Add  of nuclease free water to a new 1.5mL Lo-bind tube labelled “1”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"61t83","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"ECB35BF0B1B011EBA345ED34A5FDB2F9","id":"88020","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5k7r","text":"Remove from the magnetic stand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a53r1","text":"Using a single channel pipet, add   of RSB to the beads, pipetting up and down to resuspend, slowly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"815ab","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35","error":false,"guid":"35DF3380B1B111EBA345ED34A5FDB2F9","id":"88027","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90uu2","text":"Incubate at room temperature for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1fgnp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"3EA2DA80B1B111EBA345ED34A5FDB2F9","id":"79339","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ev01d","text":"Place tube “2” on the magnetic stand and wait until the liquid is clear (~2 minutes). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2bh28","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"p1kf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5itib","text":"Transfer  of the supernatant to a new 1.5mL Lo-bind Eppendorf tube labelled with the Run ID and “Libraries” for long term storage. Dispose of tube “2”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"edfld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"454ACD70B1B111EBA345ED34A5FDB2F9","id":"88028","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"beii9","text":"If you are stopping, store your libraries in   freezer for up to a month.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9n13u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4A48E0F0B1B111EBA345ED34A5FDB2F9","id":"48611","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3o4pf","text":"If you are not stopping, proceed to the appropriate protocol for quantification, diluting, and denaturing as per your sample type.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
